  • Arrange by 

    The handle is eye appealing and comfortable to hold. The blade is very sharp and it doesn't need to be sharpened often. This is a great knife for color coding in any restaurant.

    Jean H. Posted on 01/19/2018

    The knife is comfortable to use in the hand, sharp, and attractive. It is also reasonably priced and did a good job thinly slicing a tomato. The purple for allergen safe is a bonus.

    James Y. from Http://shavetools.com Posted on 12/23/2017

    Cutting a tomato.

    This 8" chef knife is awesome! It's very sharp and comes with nonslip handle that's color coded as well! You can use this knife for pretty much anything!

    Elijah Posted on 01/26/2017

    These are great knives! Still exceeds my expectations for a kitchen knife. They look great too, plus the colored handles are great for different foods as to minimize cross contamination!

    Person O. Posted on 01/02/2017

    This was the first Mercer knife I bought and it caused me to buy several more. The knife stays sharp and is the colors make it easy to find and recognize at a distance. I would call the mercer line of knives a must have for any commercial kitchen.

    Joel L. Posted on 12/15/2016

    This is one of our favorite knives. It is the perfect size and everyone loves using it. The handle makes it very easy to hold.

    Anthony P. Posted on 09/12/2016

    We love mercier knives, the purple handle is always used to cut vegetables for out prep station and salad bar. The different color handles prevent cross contamination

    Russell H. from Russ' Sub Shack Posted on 05/27/2016

    Excellent knife for the money. This knife is well mad for sure. Great handle and balance. The blade really holds it's edge and can be easily sharpened a very fine cutting edge.

    Ida M. from Big Bear Lodge Posted on 04/08/2016

    Long lasting and sturdy knife which is the favorite in our commercial kitchen. We have reordered several. The color handles make them even better to aid in selecting the proper knife for each food product.

    Bill L. Posted on 03/27/2016

    i scored brownie points with this as one of my cooks loves purple and I never thought i would be able to find a knife in that color. It is a quality product as well.

    Don R. from youth with a mission Posted on 03/16/2016

    I use my 8" Mercer knife on a daily basis at work. It's used to cut steaks, sandwiches, vegetables, etc. It has a very smooth cut.

    Jeff S. Posted on 01/29/2016

    I love these knives. I've had my first one for over 5 years and I still use it. They are light weight and the blade is nice and thin for cutting accurately. I also really like the color choices. They make great gifts.

    Ricca M. from YBC Posted on 01/08/2016

    Mercer M22608PU Millennia 8" Chef Knife with Purple Handle is a great knife, easy to use and how can you go wrong with a purple handle

    Christopher S. Posted on 12/22/2015

    Love This Knife! I Underestimated The Sharpness And Sliced My Thumb At First Use! For The Price It Is Great! I Love The Comfy Handle Will By More!

    Tamara E. from Kingdom Of Flavor Posted on 12/22/2015

    For a cheap little knife, it holds an edge fairly well and sharpens back up easily with a few swipes on a steel, I got this knife for a co-worker that preferred a smaller, lighter blade. The color is nice for those who wish to determine which knife is theirs at work, my co-worker loved it and gaurds it! It's not my kind of knife but I would recommend it to those who are just starting out in the kitchen or on a budget. The 8 inch blade seems to comfortable for those who tend chop very quickly, if not a little hastily!

    Michelle B. Posted on 09/01/2015

    Great Product for a excellent price, holds the edge, lays great in the hand, smooth cut to the blade and at a Wonderful price! GREAT !

    Tracy H. Posted on 05/21/2015

    This is my first chef's knife. I had seen this knife in my local restaurant store, but it was twice the price. So, I thought I would purchase it through this sight. I'm glad I did. This knife is sharp and lightweight. It has made my cooking experiences more enjoyable.

    Thomas A. Posted on 12/31/2014

    i really enjoy this 8'' knife, i love that it is has a colored handle so i know what i cut and not be afraid to cross contaminate other foods. safe to have, last a long time.
